body: "In Cuba and possibly most Hispanic countries, the children would be getting up and opening gifts this morning. The gifts were delivered by the Three Kings": My Big Fat Cuban Family blogs about The Day of the Three Kings.

title: Cuba: Three Kings Day

sentence: "In Cuba and possibly most Hispanic countries, the children would be getting up and opening gifts this morning.
The gifts were delivered by the Three Kings": My Big Fat Cuban Family blogs about The Day of the Three Kings.
